content_blocks.section: How can blockchain transform the insurance market?

content_blocks.text: This was the proposal of the paper presented at the7th Regional Workshop on Information and Computer Systems Security(WRSeg 2023), developed byVictor Hayashi, Renato Penhaand a team of Inteli students.
content_blocks.section: How can blockchain transform the insurance market?

content_blocks.text: The study presents a solution based on smart contracts on theEthereumblockchain to create mutual insurance pools, where members come together to protect themselves against specific risks. The administration of the groups is carried out partially and automatically by smart contracts, which guarantee the execution of the agreed conditions, as well as maintaining business rules and financial reserves.
content_blocks.section: How can blockchain transform the insurance market?

content_blocks.text: Users interact with the system via a web application integrated with a Web API3, allowing them to manage groups and the compensation process in an agile and secure manner.
content_blocks.section: How can blockchain transform the insurance market?

content_blocks.text: The proposal offers an innovative and accessible alternative to the insurance market, promoting greater autonomy, cost reduction and transparency, benefits made possible by the use of blockchain. Access the full articlehere.
